H0.text: The lens is where light, reflected off an object and entering the eye, falls.

H1.text: The pupil is where light that is reflected off an object and enters the eye falls.

H2.text: The retina is where light that is reflected off an object and enters the eye falls.

H3.text: The cornea is the part of the eye where light that has been reflected off an object and enters the eye falls.

A4.text: The optics of the eye create a focused two-dimensional image of the visual world on the retina
